page.title: 14LEISURE
page.content: In our area the most popular leisure activity with adults is gardening whereas children spend most of their leisure time playing football or swimming in the indoor pool at the nearby town of Bracknell. Watching sport is popular with people of all ages, in particular:Football,Cricket & Athletics.Everybody watches television everyday, adults spend on average 1 hour 45 mins watching whereas youngsters spend on average 2 hrs 30m. Listening to the radio is popular with everybody. Adults spend 4 times as long as children listening. Youngsters prefer to listen to modern popular music whereas adults prefer to listen to classical music & news programmes. The majority of youngsters belong to a club of some sort whereas only half the adult population belong to a club. Dogs are the favourite pets.
